There were no other sightings in New Delhi on or around May 21st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI was talking on the phone and i was Just looking at the sky and I saw a triangle Shaped like Object Hovering in the sky emitting red light So I just Became a little Curious to know Whats That Then I just called my younger brother and he also noticed the same thing The object was moving back forth and spinning in the sky and I also called my sister and my friends over my house to see it.We all were just Wondering if its something else or a ufo and Then I also called my parents we all saw the Weird action of that starlike thing moving in a weird manner.I also tried to call Some one from the news channel but we just wanted to confirm first
Summary: A triangle Shaped like star fluttering in the sky and emiting red and white light
